D

dao - package dao
The `dao` package contains Data Access Object (DAO) classes responsible for interacting with the database and providing methods to manage various data entities within the appointment scheduling system.
DBAppointments - Class in dao
This class provides methods to retrieve, add, modify, and delete appointment data from the database.
DBAppointments() - Constructor for class dao.DBAppointments
 
DBConnection - Class in dao
This abstract class provides methods to establish and manage a database connection.
DBConnection() - Constructor for class dao.DBConnection
 
DBContacts - Class in dao
This class provides a method to retrieve information about contacts from the database.
DBContacts() - Constructor for class dao.DBContacts
 
DBCountries - Class in dao
This class provides methods to retrieve information about countries from the database.
DBCountries() - Constructor for class dao.DBCountries
 
DBCustomers - Class in dao
This abstract class provides methods to retrieve, add, modify, and delete customer data from the database.
DBCustomers() - Constructor for class dao.DBCustomers
 
DBFirstLevelDivisions - Class in dao
This class provides methods to retrieve information about first-level divisions from the database.
DBFirstLevelDivisions() - Constructor for class dao.DBFirstLevelDivisions
 
DBReports - Class in dao
This class provides methods to retrieve various types of reports from the database.
DBReports() - Constructor for class dao.DBReports
 
DBUsers - Class in dao
This class provides methods to retrieve and manipulate user data from the database.
DBUsers() - Constructor for class dao.DBUsers
 
deleteAppointment(int) - Static method in class dao.DBAppointments
Deletes an appointment from the database.
deleteAppointmentButton - Variable in class controller.MainScreenController
 
deleteCustomer(int) - Static method in class dao.DBCustomers
Deletes a customer and their associated appointments from the database.
deleteCustomerButton - Variable in class controller.MainScreenController
 
divisionMouseEvent(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
Handles mouse event on the division combo box based on selected country.
divisionMouseEvent(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomerController
Handles the mouse event for first-level division selection.
